locations.name: Robarts 1F - Entrance
locations.brief_description: The entrance to the Robarts library.
locations.long_description: The entrance to the Robarts library. It's a weekday, so you're not surprised to see a lot of other students around at this time. You keep your head down because you have social anxiety. Thankfully, despite the events of today, you haven't lost your Tcard.

locations.name: Robarts 2F - Study Space
locations.brief_description: The study space in the Robarts library.
locations.long_description: The study space in the Robarts library. The windows keep the place well-lit and slightly less depressing. There's a lot of Starbucks cups and a few energy drink cans scattered around. You like it here, but so does everyone else, so it's not very quiet here.

locations.name: Robarts 2F - Dining Area
locations.brief_description: The dining area in the Robarts library.
locations.long_description: The dining area in the Robarts library. Students like to eat here in between lectures and long studying hours. The Starbucks always has a long line. You don't want to be reminded of how many caffeinated drinks you've bought here.

locations.name: OISE - Room G162
locations.brief_description: The lecture hall for one of your classes.
locations.long_description: The lecture hall for one of your classes. You can hear the noise from the subway throughout the building. The desks are tiny and some of them don't work. It definitely isn't your favourite place, but at least the location is convenient.

locations.name: Oak House
locations.brief_description: The student residence you live at.
locations.long_description: The student residence you live at. It's very quiet in the lobby, and there's puddles of water and snow on the floor. You like how close it is to the Robarts library, but you hate the elevator and keycard system that doesn't always work.

items.name: Laptop Charger
items.description: A charger that charges your laptop.

items.name: USB Drive
items.description: A really important flash drive that contains you and your partner's project.

items.name: Phone
items.description: Your phone that you can't go anywhere without.
